docs.title: Welcome to Tommy's Projects
docs.text: This is the central hub for my various projects hosted on GitHub Pages.

docs.title: Vitamind SPA
docs.text:
Vitamind is a specialized tool designed to help users estimate their Vitamin D production from sunlight. By combining geographic data (via Mapbox) with solar position calculations (via SunCalc), it provides insights into the best times and locations for natural Vitamin D synthesis. - Status: Active - Tech Stack: React, Vite, Mapbox GL JS, SunCalc

  • Links:
    • Live SPA
    • Documentation
